EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Oklahoma City Workshop_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed for the upcoming Cloud Platform Seminar in Oklahoma City
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Platform Seminar. See event details below.
Prior to the event, please create an account on Pivotal Network <http://network.pivotal.io>. To fully participate in the workshop, bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Date: October 27, 2015 Time: 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM Location: Colcord Hotel, 15 N. Robinson Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73102
{{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
